attributes.action: All owners of 4x4's must prove a valid reason to drive such a large vehicle.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.honestjohn.co.uk/realmpg/land-rover/discovery-4-2009
Discovery 4 2009 - AVG MPG. 28

https://www.honestjohn.co.uk/realmpg/land-rover/range-rover-sport-2013-l494
Range rover sport - AVG MPG 33

http://www.fuelly.com/car/mitsubishi/pajero
Mitsubishi Pajero - AVG MPG 20
attributes.background: Many needless 4x4's are on our roads. large off road capable vehicles are often purchased for use as a normal family car and to help with shopping. In the midst of a huge drive for enviromental change, we should also look to cut down on needless vehciles on top of the ban on all new car sales.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We aren't sure what you mean by "a valid reason".

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to use the taxation system to deter use of large cars if that is something you would like to see happen.
